description: add, modify and remove nodes from a Rackspace Cloud Load Balancer

region.description: Region to create an instance in.

state.description: Indicate desired state of the node

verify_ssl.description: Whether or not to require SSL validation of API endpoints.

wait_timeout.description: How long to wait before giving up and returning an error

env.description: Environment as configured in I(~/.pyrax.cfg), see U(https://github.com/rackspace/pyrax/blob/master/docs/getting_started.md#pyrax-configuration).

address.description: IP address or domain name of the node

credentials.description: File to find the Rackspace credentials in. Ignored if I(api_key) and I(username) are provided.

port.description: Port number of the load balanced service on the node

condition.description: Condition for the node, which determines its role within the load balancer

wait.description: Wait for the load balancer to become active before returning
